title: Victor Davis Hanson
deleted: By 2017, the [[Southern Poverty Law Centre]]'s Hatewatch reported that Hanson was keynote speaker at a conference of the [[American Freedom Alliance]], which it classifies as an anti-Muslim hate group.<ref>https://www.splcenter.org/hatewatch/2017/08/22/american-freedom-alliance-event-blames-immigrants-california%E2%80%99s-destruction</ref>  According to their reporting, 'Hanson expounded upon the reconquista conspiracy theory promoted by anti-immigrant activists' and said that 'The state (of California) is regressing into a Third-World country' due to immigration.

title: Victor Davis Hanson
deleted: By 2017, the [[Southern Poverty Law Centre]]'s Hatewatch reported that Hanson was keynote speaker at a conference of the [[American Freedom Alliance]], which it classifies as an anti-Muslim hate group.<ref>https://www.splcenter.org/hatewatch/2017/08/22/american-freedom-alliance-event-blames-immigrants-california%E2%80%99s-destruction</ref>  According to their reporting, 'Hanson expounded upon the reconquista conspiracy theory promoted by anti-immigrant activists' and said that 'The state (of California) is regressing into a Third-World country' due to immigration.
